member.name: T:Cake.Karma.KarmaAliases
member.summary: Contains functionality to interact with karma start, karma run, or karma init commands.

member.name: M:Cake.Karma.KarmaAliases.KarmaStart(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.Action{Cake.Karma.KarmaStartSettings})
member.summary: Runs karma start with a function for settings.
member.param: Function to supply for configuring settings.

member.name: M:Cake.Karma.KarmaAliases.KarmaStart(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Karma.KarmaStartSettings)
member.summary: Runs karma start with settings.

example.para: Run locally by specifying the run mode

member.name: M:Cake.Karma.KarmaAliases.KarmaRun(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.Action{Cake.Karma.KarmaRunSettings})
member.summary: Runs karma run with a function for settings.
member.param: Function to supply for configuring settings.

member.name: M:Cake.Karma.KarmaAliases.KarmaRun(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Karma.KarmaRunSettings)
member.summary: Runs karma run with settings.

example.para: Run locally by specifying the run mode

member.name: M:Cake.Karma.KarmaAliases.KarmaInit(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.Action{Cake.Karma.KarmaSettings})
member.summary: Runs karma init with a function for settings.
member.param: Function to supply for configuring settings.

member.summary: The karma runner for local mode execution.

member.summary: The name of the tool, used during logging.

member.summary: Available tool executable names for local karma runs.

member.name: M:Cake.Karma.KarmaRunnerLocal`1.Execute(`0)
member.summary: Execute the runner with the specified settings. If LocalKarmaCli is not set, it defaults to .

member.name: M:Cake.Karma.KarmaRunnerLocal`1.ValidateSettings(`0)
member.summary: Validates the provides settings for local mode.
member.exception: Thrown when the runner is used when settings.RunMode is not Local.
Thrown if the Karma CLI file cannot be located.

member.name: F:Cake.Karma.KarmaRunMode.Local

member.name: T:Cake.Karma.KarmaSettings
member.summary: Settings common across all Karma commands.

member.name: F:Cake.Karma.KarmaSettings.DefaultCliFile
member.summary: The default Karma CLI file, if one is not specified during local run mode.

member.name: P:Cake.Karma.KarmaSettings.RunMode
member.summary: Run karma locally or globally. Defaults to KarmaRunMode.Global.

member.name: P:Cake.Karma.KarmaSettings.LocalKarmaCli
member.summary: Path to Karma CLI. Use this if you want to utilise a local Karma deployment, otherwise Global use is attempted.

member.name: P:Cake.Karma.KarmaSettings.ConfigFile
member.summary: The conf.js file to use.

member.name: P:Cake.Karma.KarmaSettings.LogLevel
member.summary: Level of logging.

member.name: P:Cake.Karma.KarmaSettings.Colors
member.summary: Use colors when reporting or printing logs. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:Cake.Karma.KarmaSettings.NoColors
member.summary: Do not use colors when reporting or printing logs. Defaults to false.

member.name: M:Cake.Karma.KarmaSettings.EvaluateCore(Cake.Core.IO.ProcessArgumentBuilder)
member.summary: Evaluate further settings.

member.name: T:Cake.Karma.KarmaSharedSettings
member.summary: Settings shared across start and run commands.

member.name: P:Cake.Karma.KarmaSharedSettings.Port
member.summary: Port where the server is listening.

member.name: P:Cake.Karma.KarmaSharedSettings.FailOnEmptyTestSuite
member.summary: Fail on empty test suite. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:Cake.Karma.KarmaSharedSettings.NoFailOnEmptyTestSuite
member.summary: Do not fail on empty test suite. Defaults to false.

member.name: T:Cake.Karma.KarmaRunSettings
member.summary: Settings specific to karma run.

member.name: P:Cake.Karma.KarmaRunSettings.NoRefresh
member.summary: Do not re-glob all the patterns. Defaults to false.

member.name: M:Cake.Karma.KarmaRunSettings.EvaluateCore(Cake.Core.IO.ProcessArgumentBuilder)
member.summary: Applies the settings to the process arguments ready for execution.
member.param: The builder to apply the settings to.

member.name: T:Cake.Karma.KarmaStartSettings
member.summary: Settings specific to karma start.

member.name: P:Cake.Karma.KarmaStartSettings.AutoWatch
member.summary: Auto watch source files and run on change.

member.name: P:Cake.Karma.KarmaStartSettings.NoAutoWatch
member.summary: Do not watch source files.

member.name: P:Cake.Karma.KarmaStartSettings.Detached
member.summary: Detach the server.

member.name: P:Cake.Karma.KarmaStartSettings.Reporters
member.summary: List of reporters.

member.name: P:Cake.Karma.KarmaStartSettings.Browsers
member.summary: List of browsers to start.

member.name: P:Cake.Karma.KarmaStartSettings.CaptureTimeout
member.summary: Kill browser if does not capture in given time (ms).

member.name: P:Cake.Karma.KarmaStartSettings.SingleRun
member.summary: Run the test when the browsers captured and exit.

member.name: P:Cake.Karma.KarmaStartSettings.NoSingleRun
member.summary: Disable single-run.

member.name: P:Cake.Karma.KarmaStartSettings.ReportSlowerThan
member.summary: Report tests that are slower then given time (ms).

member.name: M:Cake.Karma.KarmaStartSettings.EvaluateCore(Cake.Core.IO.ProcessArgumentBuilder)
member.summary: Applies the settings to the process arguments ready for execution.
member.param: The builder to apply the settings to.
